channel.title: Splinter Cell Pandora Tomorrow Installation Help Please
channel.description:
Hi, I recently got Splinter Cell PT and I am having some problems running it. I ran the diagnostic thing that comes with it but it has some errors.
64 MB video Memory or Higher 12 X
Required Pixel Shader support Inadequate Pixel Shader support detected X
Non power-of-two render target support NO Non power-of-two render support detected X
D3DRS_COLORWRITEENABLE support NO D3DRS_COLORWRITEENABLE support detected X
Thanks in advance
EDIT: Here is a picture:
[img]http://www.rsspot.nationvoice.com/Help.png[/img]

item.title: Splinter Cell Pandora Tomorrow Installation Help Please

@h44ckzor_pwnage wrote:

“Those type” The whole type is crap so it really doesn’t matter.

Read full topic

item.title: Splinter Cell Pandora Tomorrow Installation Help Please
item.dc:creator: @therealjdb JDB`
item.description:
@therealjdb wrote:

h44ckzor pwnage:

Ok. Thanks for all the help guys, Looks like I am not going to get a new video card so I’m stuffed. Thanks again.

Yeah dude you even got the faster card of those type apparently lol:

NVIDIA Vanta/Vanta LT:The NVIDIA Vanta™ is a low-cost, 128-bit TwiN Texel, highly integrated 3D graphics processor, designed specifically for value-conscious users. Leveraging the NVIDIA TNT architecture, NVIDIA Vanta delivers breakthrough 3D and industry-leading 2D graphics performance, making it ideal for today's basic desktop PC. The NVIDIA Vanta [b]comes in 4-16MB[/b] configurations.

Read full topic
